segments.text: Here's some dancing . See those guys stomping , clapping and shouting ? They're practicing step-dancing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sounds cool . The rhythms look really difficult .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They basically turn their bodies into drums . There's a national step competition every year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , black people are supposed to be great dancers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wen ! That's only a stereotype . Like all Asians are supposed to be math geniuses . I'm not a great dancer , and you said you failed calculus .
segments.speaker: S1
